puzzle.help: 1. Mark some tiles according to these rules: 2. Cells with numbers are never marked. 3. A number in a cell indicates how many marked cells must be placed. adjacent to its four sides. 4. However, in each region there is one (and only one) wrong number (it shows a wrong amount of marked cells). 5. Two marked cells must not be orthogonally adjacent. 6. All of the non-marked cells must be connected.
